dmca.title: LDS does the DMCA
dmca.body:
[From ISP to content provider]

We recently received the email below.  Please remove the items listed below from your website ASAP.  Thanks.

---------

NOTICE:  This communication may contain privileged or other confidential information.  If you are not the intended recipient, or believe that you have received this communication in error, please do not print, copy, retransmit, disseminate, or otherwise use this information.  Also, please indicate to the sender that you have received this email in error, and delete the copy you received.  Thank you.

Dear Abuse Department at Your-Site:

	This is to notify you that your network is facilitating and/or contributing to copyright infringement at the following Internet location:

	http://www.lds4u.com

	In accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA"), see 17. U.S.C.
dmca.principal_name: Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
